title: Major League Cricket returns to Grand Prairie for 2024 season
body:
Major League Cricket released the 2024 season schedule with more than half of the matches again being played in Grand Prairie, including an extended playoff tournament.

The 2024 season begins with two matches across the country on July 5. MLC's reigning champions MI New York will face off against 2023 runner-ups Seattle Orcas in Morrisville, North Carolina at 3:30 p.m. ET.

The Texas Super Kings headed by South African Faf du Plessis will play against the LA Knight Riders at Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie the same day at 7:30 p.m.

"We are incredibly excited to unveil the schedule for the 2024 season, " said Major League Cricket’s CEO, Vijay Srinivasan expressing his excitement for the second season of the sport.

“Last year, we unveiled MLC at the newly upgraded Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina, and the brand new Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, which will both once again co-host the 2024 tournament, building on the impact of season one in those communities,” Srinivasan said.

“These venues will deliver world-class pitches and a vibrant atmosphere to support the overall MLC fan experience. Moreover, we are committed to exploring expansion opportunities with new cricket venues to support our six teams’ growing American fanbase.”

MLC said demand led to extending the monthlong tournament by six league matches culminating in a four-team playoff series that will be hosted in Grand Prairie.

Sports Connection

Connecting you to your favorite North Texas sports teams as well as sports news around the globe.

Tickets for all matches will go on sale in the coming weeks and can be purchased through the official Major League Cricket website.

2024 MLC SEASON SCHEDULE

MI New York vs Seattle Orcas 7/5/24 2:30 pm CT Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

Texas Super Kings vs Los Angeles Knight Riders 7/5/24 7:30 p.m. Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Washington Freedom vs MI New York 7/6/24 2:00 p.m. Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

San Franciso Unicorns vs Los Angeles Knight Riders 7/7/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Washington Freedom vs Texas Super Kings 7/8/24 2 p.m. CT Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

Los Angeles Knight Riders vs Seattle Orcas 7/9/24 7:30 p.m. Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

San Franciso Unicorns vs Texas Super Kings 7/10/24 2 p.m. CT Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

Seattle Orcas vs Washington Freedom 7/12/24 7:30 a.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Mi New York vs Texas Super Kings 7/12/24 2 p.m. CT Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

Los Angeles Knight Riders vs San Francisco Unicorms 7/13/24 2 p.m. Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

Washington Freedom vs Los Angeles Knight Riders 7/14/24 2:30 p.m. Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

Texas Super Kings vs MI New York 7/14/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Seattle Orcas vs San Franciso Unicorns 7/15/24 2 p.m. CT Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

MI New York vs Washington Freedom 7/16/24 7:30 p.m. Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Seattle Orcas vs Los Angeles Knight Riders 7/17/24 2 p.m. Church Street Park, Morrisville, NC

MI New York vs San Francisco Unicorns 7/18/24 7:30 p.m. Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Texas Super Kings vs Washing Freedom 7/19/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

San Francisco Unicorns vs Seattle Orcas 7/20/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Los Angeles Knight Riders vs MI New York 7/21/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

San Francisco Unicorns vs Washington Freedom 7/22/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

Texas Super Kings vs Seattle Orcas 7/23/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

ELIMINATOR: Seed 3 vs Seed 4 7/24/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

QUALIFIER: Seed 1 vs Seed 3 7/25/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

CHALLENGER: Loser Qualifier vs Winner Eliminator 7/26/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

CHAMPIONSHIP: Winner Qualifier vs Winner Challenger 7/28/24 7:30 p.m. CT Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, TX

title: MAJOR LEAGUE CRICKET UNLEASHES 2024 SEASON SCHEDULE, MARKING A NEW ERA OF T20 ACTION IN THE UNITED STATES
body:
MLC’s World Class T20 Action Returns To The United States This Summer

SAN FRANCISCO, CA, USA, May 7, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ -- MAJOR LEAGUE CRICKET UNLEASHES 2024 SEASON SCHEDULE, MARKING A NEW ERA OF T20 ACTION IN THE UNITED STATES.

MLC’s World Class T20 Action Returns To The United States This Summer

SAN FRANCISCO, CA (Tuesday, 7 May 2024, EDT)—Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) is thrilled to announce the highly anticipated schedule for the 2024 season, a significant milestone in the history of T20 cricket in the United States. The season promises an exhilarating lineup of matches featuring some of the world’s best international players and the nation’s top domestic talent.

Building on the momentum of its inaugural 2023 season, Cognizant Major League Cricket has extended the tournament due to demand with an extra six league matches. The four-game playoff series, to be hosted in Grand Prairie, TX, is set to captivate cricket fans across the globe.

The 2024 season will commence with two matches across the country on July 5th, headlined by MLC’s reigning champions, MI New York, featuring their elite West Indian batter Kieron Pollard, who will face off against 2023 runners-up Seattle Orcas headlined by star South African pair Wayne Parnell and Quinton de Kock, at Church Street Park in Morrisville at 3:30 PM EDT.

The Texas Super Kings, spearheaded by classy South African Faf du Plessis, will take on West Indian off-spinner Sunil Narine’s LA Knight Riders at the purpose-built Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, TX at 7:30 PM CDT.

The opening weekend also features the Australian-stacked Washington Freedom featuring Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, Travis Head, and coach Ricky Ponting, facing MI New York on Saturday, July 6, at 3:00 pm EDT. The San Francisco Unicorns, bolstered by hard-hitting opening New Zealand batter Finn Allen, will host the LA Knight Riders on Sunday night at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX, at 7:30 PM CDT.

Cognizant Major League Cricket’s CEO, Vijay Srinivasan can't wait to see the passion and enthusiasm come to life with cricket fans across the country for the second season of Major League Cricket.

"We are incredibly excited to unveil the schedule for the 2024 season," said Srinivasan.

"This promises to be our most thrilling season yet, with each of the MLC’s six teams actively recruiting in the off-season, adding a host of world-class player signings to their team rosters with more big names to be soon announced.

“With some of world cricket’s biggest current stars and seasoned veterans involved, including the likes of athletic Jamaican allrounder Andre Russell, New Zealand’s left-arm quick, Trent Boult, 2023 MLC Finals MVP Nicholas Pooran, Afghanistan's superstar spinner, Rashid Khan, together with cricketing royalty in coaches Ricky Ponting, Shane Watson and Stephen Fleming, it demonstrates the depth of talent being attracted to the league.”

In addition to the highly anticipated matches, MLC remains committed to supporting the long-term infrastructure to foster the growth of localized cricket communities and strengthen cricket’s presence in the US.

“Last year, we unveiled MLC at the newly upgraded Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina, and the brand new Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, which will both once again co-host the 2024 tournament, building on the impact of season one in those communities,” Srinivasan said.

“These venues will deliver world-class pitches and a vibrant atmosphere to support the overall MLC fan experience. Moreover, we are committed to exploring expansion opportunities with new cricket venues to support our six teams’ growing American fanbase.”

Off the back of Major League Cricket’s first successful season and a momentum boost from the ICC T20 World Cup in the U.S. in June - the 2024 season is primed to reach new heights with cricket fever to captivate the US this summer.

Tickets for all matches will go on sale in the coming weeks and can be purchased through the official Major League Cricket website. Fans are encouraged to secure their tickets early by registering for the pre-sale to ensure they don't miss out on the action after sell-out crowds in 2023.

For more information about Major League Cricket and to view the full schedule for the 2024 season, please visit www.majorleaguecricket.com

ENDS

NOTE: This content is not written by or endorsed by "KTVI", its advertisers, or Nexstar Media Inc.

title: Major League Cricket
body:
Major League Cricket (MLC) has quickly become a landmark in the world of professional cricket, especially within the United States. Launched in the summer of 2023, MLC represents America’s first full-fledged foray into professional Twenty20 cricket, bringing together both local talent and international stars under one exciting tournament. As the anticipation builds for its second season in the summer of 2024, cricket enthusiasts around the globe are eagerly waiting to see how the competition unfolds.

Why the Excitement for MLC 2024?

The MLC is not just another cricket league; it is a pioneering venture aimed at establishing and popularizing world-class T20 cricket across America. With its inaugural season drawing widespread attention, the league is set to return in 2024 with even more thrilling cricket action.

In its first season, the MLC featured six foundational teams: the Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings, and Washington Freedom. These teams are set to compete again, bringing continuity and developing rivalries that are sure to captivate fans. MI New York, the champions of the inaugural season, will be defending their title, having clinched the championship with a spectacular innings from Nicholas Pooran, who scored 137 runs off just 55 balls in the final.

At Crictips.com, we are all set to bring you match-by-match predictions, detailed analysis, and insights into the 2024 MLC season. Whether you’re a seasoned cricket bettor or a new fan of the game, our predictions and tips are designed to enhance your viewing experience and help you understand the dynamics of each game. Check back on this page regularly for our comprehensive coverage of what promises to be a stellar season of MLC T20 cricket!

Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024 Schedule for Viewers in India

The upcoming Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024 season is poised to deliver some of the most thrilling cricketing action, with the tournament set to kick off on July 5th. For fans watching from India, navigating the time difference is crucial for catching all the live action. Here’s a detailed look at the MLC schedule, adjusted for Indian Standard Time (IST), so you don’t miss any of the matches.

Key Dates and Times for MLC 2024 (All times in IST)

title: Major League Cricket
body:
Get your tickets now for the second season of Major League Cricket – America’s professional T20 Cricket League! See the superstars of cricket from around the world up close throughout July.

If you're interested in bringing a group of 15+ or want to purchase a suite or club seats, please contact [email protected] for info on special pricing and experiences.

Star players set to take part include Afghanistan T20 superstar Rashid Khan, South African internationals Faf du Plessis, Quinton de Kock and Heinrich Klaasen, West Indians Kieron Pollard, Andre Russell and Nicholas Pooran, Australians Steve Smith, Travis Head and Glenn Maxwell, England's Jason Roy and Liam Plunkett, and New Zealand’s Trent Boult, Rachin Ravindra and Glenn Phillips.
